channel.title: Custom Minigame! ;)
channel.description:
Well i've just being working on a custom minigame but I got these errors, I am pretty sure it has to do with imports, but i'm not sure where and what import I should add please help.
[code=java]src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:906: error: cannot find symbol final Client c2 = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[npcs[i].spawned By]; ^ symbol: variable PlayerHandler location: class NPCHandler src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:932: error: cannot find symbol Client c = (Client) PlayerHandler.players[npcs[i].spawnedBy]; ^ symbol: variable PlayerHandler location: class NPCHandler Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Thanks guys!

item.title: Custom Minigame! ;)
item.dc:creator: @ClairtyX ClairtyX
item.description:
@ClairtyX wrote:

[quote=“K0y, post:2, topic:457416”]You’re doing the right thing by associating the class directly (it’d be easier to add it to imports though).
This way works fine but you need to lay out the full path because the NpcHandler class and the PlayerHandler class are in separate directories…
To get it to work, take this:

And simply change it to this:

You’re welcome :)[/quote]

Love ya man wish I could rep. I am an idiot for not noticing that. Lol it was right in front of me. That’s what you get for 3am coding

Read full topic
